review_text: My daughter-in-law wanted this for so long to make fresh sorbet, I bought it as a gift for her. She has already made watermelon sorbet and it came out great. If you buy this I recommend buying the extra canister so you can leave it in te freezer and always be ready.
product_name: Cuisinart ICE-20 Automatic 1-1/2-Quart Ice Cream Maker, White
